message_list.message: Succes: The transaction was successful and the payment has been received/approved.
Validation failed: The transaction request contains errors and therefore could not be processed properly.
Technical error: The transaction could not be completed due to a technical error.
Unfortunately the payment was unsuccessfull. Please try again or choose a different payment method.
Pending input: The transaction is put on hold while the payment engine is waiting for the consumerâ€™s input.
Pending processing: The transaction is being processed. The reason is often that the consumer still has to return from a third-party website before being able to complete the transaction.
Pending consumer: The consumer still has to take action, for example in case of a Transfer: transfer money manually from his banking environment.
The transaction is put on hold.
Cancelled by User: The client has cancelled the transaction.
Cancelled by the Merchant: The Merchant has cancelled the transaction.
